ValidationRule.description: Conditions must be satisfied prior to Closing and Booking & Funding
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = false, Unsatisfied_Conditions_Closing__c >= 1, OR( ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c , 'Closing'), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c , 'Booking & Funding') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Conditions must be satisfied prior to Closing and Booking & Funding
